entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
